oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dog tags of Pvt. Robert Rufus Rust, Co. K, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A group of identificaion discs belonging to Pvt. Robert Rufus Rust, Co. K, 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div. Two of the discs are aluminum and one appears to be of copper. They are stamped with "ROBERT R. RUST/PVT./ CO. K 117/ U.S.A." The reverse is stamped "ADAMS. TENN. / 1 309 299." During an attack, Rust had his own rifle shot from his hands. He picked up an abandoned Lewis gun and silenced a German machine gun. He received the U.S. Silver Star and the Military Medal from the British.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World war, 1914-1918; World war, 1914-1918 - History
